page.title: 03FARMING
page.content:
Bartle Brothers ESQ Farming
We interviewed Bartle Brothers about their farm.There are 4 brothers and 2 part_time workers when they are needed.They have got 7 tractors but they dont all work on the land.They have 500 acres of land and they grow Wheat,Barley,Grass for Silage and Grass fields for the horses and cows.They have got 1 Combine which is a new one.There has always been a farm there and they have all worked there all of their lives.They have got Beast,Calves,Cows and Ponies.They sell their Wheat and Barley to Frank Coney. They grow their own vegetables for themselves.
